metadata.title: Patty Car | Luxury Car Service
metadata.description: Travel with elegance, comfort and punctuality with our luxury car service

hero.title: Travel with elegance, comfort and punctuality
hero.description: Since 1998, Patty Car has been offering high-level chauffeur services (NCC), guaranteeing exclusive and personalized transfers in Italy and abroad. Whether for business or pleasure, our service is available 24/7 to meet all your travel needs.
hero.subDescription: Whether you're heading to a business meeting, a special event, or simply desire a luxury transfer, Patty Car is the perfect choice for all your travel needs.

items.title: NCC Transfer
items.description: Travel in style and comfort with our fleet of luxury cars, vans, and buses. Perfect for private, corporate, or tourist transfers.

items.title: Transport for events
items.description: Elegant transportation solutions for weddings, ceremonies, and special occasions.

items.title: Diplomatic services
items.description: We manage transfers for consular and diplomatic officials, coordinating with law enforcement to ensure maximum security.

items.title: Luxury Hotel Services
items.description: Collaborations with luxury hotels to offer their guests an exclusive transport service.

items.title: Business transfers
items.description: Mobility solutions for professionals and companies with regular transport needs.

about.label: About Us
about.title: A prestigious NCC service since 1998
about.paragraph1: Patty Car is a reference point in the chauffeur service sector. With offices in Milan and Rome and a widespread network of collaborators, we operate throughout the national and international territory. We have had the honor of serving prestigious events such as Expo 2015 and the Paris 2024 Olympic Games. Our mission is to offer impeccable service, available 24 hours a day, every day of the week, to guarantee you a stress-free travel experience with maximum comfort.

experiences.title: recommended
experiences.subtitle: Offer your guests a unique travel experience with our exclusive tours

items.title: Maranello Tour
items.description: An unforgettable experience in the world of Ferrari

items.title: Lake Como and Bellagio Tour
items.description: Discover the beauty of the lake and its historic villages

items.title: Serravalle Transfer with VIP Lounge
items.description: Luxury shopping with exclusive transport service

booking.title: Request a reservation
booking.subtitle: Fill out the form to book your luxury transfer
booking.meetAndGreetLabel: Meet and Greet service at the airport
booking.successMessage: Thank you for your request. We will contact you soon.
booking.description: Booking your journey with us is a simple and quick experience, designed for those seeking impeccable service at every stage. Our intuitive platform allows you to reserve your transfer or tour in just a few steps, with the certainty of exclusive treatment from the first contact.
booking.formSubtitle: Fill out the form to book your transfer
booking.bookingDescription: Booking your journey with us is a simple and quick experience, designed for those seeking impeccable service at every stage. Our intuitive platform allows you to reserve your transfer or tour in just a few steps, with the certainty of exclusive treatment from the first contact.
booking.bookingFormSubtitle: Fill out the form to book your transfer

transfer-ncc.title: NCC Transfer
transfer-ncc.subtitle: Your time is precious, your comfort is essential
transfer-ncc.intro: Your time is a treasure, and every journey deserves to be treated with the same care and attention reserved for the most exclusive details.
transfer-ncc.description: With our luxury transfer service, every journey becomes a moment of pure pleasure and satisfaction, designed for those who know that the value of an experience is measured not only in the certainty of arrival, but also in the quality of the journey.

sections.title: Serenity
sections.description: Your time is a treasure, and every journey deserves to be treated with the same care and attention reserved for the most exclusive details.

sections.title: Punctuality
sections.description: Imagine being welcomed by a professional, elegant, and discreet chauffeur, ready to drive you to your destination in a vehicle of excellence, selected to offer the maximum of luxury and comfort.

sections.title: Always available
sections.description: For our most demanding clients, our service is available 24 hours a day, both in Italy and abroad, guaranteeing unparalleled continuity.

highlight.text: Whether you're looking for a first-class airport transfer, transportation for prestigious events, or simply the comfort of a stress-free journey, our service is synonymous with elegance and safety.

transfer-ncc.conclusion: With us, every journey is more than just a simple transfer: it's an opportunity to experience luxury, refinement, and elegance at every moment.

events.title: Transport for events
events.subtitle: Elegant transportation for every special occasion
events.intro: Every special event deserves a memorable entrance. Our event transportation service ensures that you and your guests arrive in style and on time.
events.description: Whether it's a wedding, a corporate ceremony, or a gala event, our team of professionals will take care of every detail to ensure an impeccable transportation experience. We offer a fleet of luxury vehicles, experienced drivers, and personalized service to meet the specific needs of your event.

sections.title: Detailed Planning
sections.description: Complete coordination with event organizers to ensure that every aspect of transportation is perfectly synchronized with the event schedule.

sections.title: Group Management
sections.description: Solutions for groups of any size, with logistical coordination to ensure that all guests arrive on time and in total comfort.

sections.title: Premium Service
sections.description: Attention to details and customization for each event, with vehicles decorated according to your preferences and drivers in formal attire.

highlight.text: With our event service, every special occasion becomes even more memorable. From weddings to corporate ceremonies, we guarantee a transportation experience that reflects the importance of your event.

events.conclusion: With Patty Car, transportation becomes an integral part of the success of your event, ensuring a memorable experience for you and your guests.

diplomatic.title: Diplomatic services
diplomatic.subtitle: Reserved and professional transportation for diplomatic delegations
diplomatic.intro: Patty Car's diplomatic services are designed to meet the specific needs of embassies, consulates, and international delegations, ensuring security, discretion, and professionalism.
diplomatic.description: Our experience in serving diplomatic clients has allowed us to develop specific protocols that respect the security and confidentiality requirements. We collaborate with law enforcement when necessary and guarantee impeccable service for every diplomatic mission.

sections.title: Security
sections.description: Advanced security protocols and coordination with law enforcement to ensure safe transfers for high-profile personalities.

sections.title: Confidentiality
sections.description: Maximum discretion and respect for privacy, with drivers selected and specifically trained to serve diplomatic clientele.

sections.title: International Experience
sections.description: Multilingual staff and knowledge of international diplomatic protocols for a service that respects conventions and traditions.

highlight.text: Our diplomatic service has been chosen by numerous embassies and consulates for its reliability and professionalism. We understand the importance of protocol and ensure that every aspect of the service meets the highest standards.

diplomatic.conclusion: With Patty Car, diplomatic delegations can rely on a service that understands the importance of protocol, security, and discretion.

luxury-hotels.title: Luxury Hotel Services
luxury-hotels.subtitle: Exclusive transportation service for guests of the best hotels
luxury-hotels.intro: Patty Car collaborates with the best luxury hotels to offer their guests an impeccable transportation experience, extending the elegance and comfort of the hotel to the final destination.
luxury-hotels.description: Our luxury hotel service is designed to integrate perfectly with the experience offered by the hotel. We offer an extension of the luxury and attention to detail that guests expect, ensuring continuity in service excellence.

sections.title: Hotel Integration
sections.description: Service perfectly integrated with partner hotel facilities, with direct communication between our team and the hotel concierge.

sections.title: Premium Experience
sections.description: Extension of the hotel's luxury experience during transportation, with high-end vehicles and personalized services.

sections.title: 24/7 Availability
sections.description: Service available at any time for hotel guests, with bookings managed directly by the reception or concierge.

highlight.text: Our collaboration with luxury hotels has allowed us to develop a service that meets the expectations of the most demanding guests. We offer airport transfers, personalized tours, and private chauffeur services for shopping and events.

luxury-hotels.conclusion: Choosing Patty Car for hotel transportation services means guaranteeing guests a travel experience that matches the prestige of the facility.

business.title: Business transfers
business.subtitle: Mobility solutions for professionals and companies
business.intro: Patty Car offers tailored business transportation solutions for professionals and companies that require reliability, punctuality, and discretion in their business travel.
business.description: Our business service is designed to optimize the valuable time of professionals, ensuring punctual and comfortable transfers. We offer customized solutions for companies with regular transportation needs, with the possibility of corporate accounts and detailed reporting.

sections.title: Professionalism
sections.description: Experienced and discreet drivers, accustomed to the needs of the business world, ready to adapt to schedule changes and last-minute requests.

sections.title: Efficiency
sections.description: Optimization of travel times and guaranteed punctuality, with constant traffic monitoring and planning of alternative routes.

sections.title: Global Coverage
sections.description: Service available in Italy and abroad, with international partners to ensure continuity of service wherever your business takes you.

highlight.text: Our business solutions include airport transfers, dedicated chauffeur service for meeting days, transportation for corporate events and conferences, and solutions for team trips and delegations.

business.conclusion: Choosing Patty Car for business transfers means investing in the productivity and image of your company, ensuring comfort and punctuality in every journey.

fleet.title: Fleet
fleet.subtitle: Elegance and prestige in every detail
fleet.description: Our fleet consists of high-end vehicles, selected to offer the maximum comfort, refinement, and safety. Travel with us and discover the pleasure of unparalleled comfort.

highlight.text: Entrust your journey to our fleet and experience excellence at every kilometer.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: We are at your disposal for any information.
contact.companyInfo1: Our company has offices in Milan and Rome; however, thanks to a dense network of collaborators, we are able to operate throughout Italy and abroad, as happened during the Paris 2024 Games.
contact.companyInfo2: Based on the needs and requirements of the client, our company offers transfer services with cars, vans, and buses. In order to guarantee a quality service, we offer 24/7 availability, every day of the week.
contact.companyInfo3: Operating in the sector for many years, we are able to offer a range of transversal services, aimed at satisfying a heterogeneous clientele, which includes the hotel, sports, corporate, private, and, above all, events sectors.
contact.legalInfo: legal information privacy, terms of service, etc.
